text: thumb Jorge Rubén Aguado (6 November 1925 – 12 July 2019) was an Argentine politician. ==National Reorganization Process== Aguado was Minister of Agriculture and Livestock in the year of 1981 and was the de facto Governor of Buenos Aires Province from 1982 to 1983.Profundo pesar en carbap por el fellacimiento de Jorge Ruben Aguado agritotal.com Retrieved 16 July 2019 ==Politics== He was National Deputy for Buenos Aires Province between 1989 and 1993, representing the Union of the Democratic Center. ==Private sector== He served in the private sector as director of the Correo Argentino. ==After== Aguado died on 12 July 2019, in Buenos Aires at the age of 93.Falleció el exgobernador bonaerense, empresario y ruralista Jorge Aguado ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Politicians from Buenos Aires
title: Jorge Aguado
